titles.title: He Brought Forth His People With Joy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He brought forth His people with joy.
He brought forth His people with joy,
His chosen with gladness.
He brought forth His people with joy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He brought them forth with silver and with gold,
And there was not one feeble among their tribe.
He spread a cloud for a covering,
And fire to light the night.
He opened the rock and waters gushed out,
Like rivers in dry places.
